titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Family, Career and Community Leaders of America.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 7/8/2015--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideals of Family, Career and Community Leaders of America, recognizes the importance of career and technical education in preparing a well-educated and skilled workforce, and encourages the promotion of such training as an option for students.
